QuestData.Title: The Greatest Flavor in the World!
QuestData.Description: Below us is a cave. It's huge! The perfect location for our new refrigerated vault. It's big enough to hold all of our inventory with room to grow.$B$BUnfortunately, when we were almost done equipping all of the pipes, bugs burrowed up out of nowhere and killed all of my employees!$B$BHow was I supposed to know?$B$BBut it gave me a great idea: silithid-flavored ice cream. We'll make a killing!$B$BAll I need now are the ingredients.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got enough bug goo for the first batch?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh yeah! This is going to be the greatest flavor in the world!$B$BLook out, Tigule and Foror!!!
